parameters.name: DestRegion
parameters.description:
The region where the geo-redundant backup set is located.

> - This parameter is required when you query a geo-redundant backup.

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the resource group.

parameters.name: SrcRegion
parameters.description:
The region of the source instance for geo-redundancy.

> - This parameter is required when you query a geo-redundant backup.
